snippet: Former Jet Curtis Martin, who will be inducted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame Saturday, has his eyes set on becoming a team owner.
abstract: Former New York Jets running back Curtis Martin, who will be inducted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame, has his eyes set on becoming a team owner.
lead_paragraph: Former Jet Curtis Martin, who will be inducted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame Saturday, has his eyes set on becoming a team owner.

headline.seo: For Curtis Martin, Hall Is Latest Stop in a Still Unfolding Career
headline.main: For Martin, Hall Is Latest Stop in a Still Unfolding Career
headline.print_headline: For Martin, Hall Is Latest Stop in a Still Unfolding Career
